original_text: There is nobody who understands what is true. There is nobody who wants to worship God. There is nobody who understands what is true.
korean_text: 깨닫는 자도 없고 하나님을 찾는 자도 없고

sentences.original_text: There is nobody who understands what is true
There is nobody who wants to worship God
There is nobody who understands what is true
